item.title: Roadwork signs not removed in Park Rd by station, 20th January
item.description:
Roadwork signs that were installed following the new pedestrian crossing on Copers Cope have not been removed. Both signs are in Park Road. One roadworks sign is at the top of the railway subway, the other has been folded up and is resting alongside 61 Copers Cope rd. Please remove.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Park Road, New Beckenham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Restricted view pulling out of station, 20th January
item.description:

item.title: A running public water tap outside garage won't turn off, 20th January
item.description:
I heard the sound of running water, and noticed a public water tap running approximately where indicated on the map on the narrow alleyway approximately behind number 88 St. Mary Street but on the far (southern) side of the alleyway immediately outside one of the row of garages. I couldn't turn if off.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Rectory Place, Woolwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Constant weekly flytipping as no signs or fines, 20th January
item.description:
Me again! Multiple reports all winter. Estates team will next plant here - items ordered Signage /flyers still actually needed around this estate as believe they just dump at garages instead after planting. Fines best CCTV asked for by Cllr Gavin Edwards

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gibbon Road, Nunhead, Greater London

item.title: Light not coming on, 20th January
item.description:
The heritage lamp on Kelsey Lane near Kelsey Square behind 2 Coopers Mews BR3 1AJ is not coming on. It makes walking on the pavement very dark in this area. I seem to report this fault almost every year, even since the switch to LED?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kelsey Lane, Beckenham, Greater London
